about_the_game:
Blast off for fortune in Epic Space Trader, a classic trading adventure!

Live the dream of a spacefaring tycoon!

Embark on a thrilling voyage through a vast galaxy in this addictive space trading simulation.

Chart your course across a living galaxy:

  • Buy low, Sell high: Explore a dynamic marketplace and exploit fluctuating prices to become a galactic mogul.

  • Beware of space hazards: Navigate asteroid fields, dodge pirates, and encounter the unexpected on your interstellar journeys.

  • Multiple paths to profit: Trade goods, take on lucrative bounties, or become a notorious space pirate - the choice is yours!

Simple to learn, challenging to master:

Intuitive interface: Perfect for new traders, but with enough depth to keep hardened space veterans engaged for hours.

  • Upgrade your ship and crew: Invest your profits in a bigger hold, more powerful weapons, and a skilled team to maximize your edge.

  • The galaxy awaits: Unravel its secrets, forge alliances, and carve your own legend among the stars.

Can you amass enough wealth to retire on a luxurious moon? Will you become a beacon of commerce or a ruthless space pirate? The galaxy is your oyster in Epic Space Trader!

Key Features:

  • Open-ended sandbox experience - choose your own path to riches!

  • Manage your cargo, crew, and ship upgrades for maximum efficiency

  • A vast galaxy filled with dynamic markets, hazards, and opportunities
    Hours of replay-ability - Utilizing procedurally generated galaxy and star systems, no two play-throughs are the same!

Are you ready to trade your way to the top? Launch Epic Space Trader today!

Embark on a thrilling voyage through a vast galaxy in this addictive space trading simulation.

  • Buy low, Sell high: Explore a dynamic marketplace and exploit fluctuating prices to become a galactic mogul.

  • Beware of space hazards: Navigate asteroid fields, dodge pirates, and encounter the unexpected on your interstellar journeys.

Simple to learn, challenging to master:

Intuitive interface: Perfect for new traders, but with enough depth to keep hardened space veterans engaged for hours.

  • Upgrade your ship and crew: Invest your profits in a bigger hold, more powerful weapons, and a skilled team to maximize your edge.

  • The galaxy awaits: Unravel its secrets, forge alliances, and carve your own legend among the stars.

Can you amass enough wealth to retire on a luxurious moon? Will you become a beacon of commerce or a ruthless space pirate? The galaxy is your oyster in Epic Space Trader!

Are you ready to trade your way to the top? Launch Epic Space Trader today!
legal_notice: This product was designed and produced by Digital Tectonics, LLC and is made and owned by Digital Tectonics, LLC.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.3
  • Processor: SteamOS 3.3
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RADV VANGOGH
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.4.9
  • Processor: AMD CUSTOM APU 0405
  • Memory: 384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RADV VANGOGH
  • Storage: 340 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: 10.11
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Epic Space Trader

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2500 or AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: UPC
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1060
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Commanding a starship, you’ll trade goods across the galaxy, evade cosmic threats, and grow your trading empire. Do you have what it takes to outmaneuver rivals and become a trading legend? Take command of your destiny in Epic Space Trader, your journey to the stars begins now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
